item.title: Justin Baeder asks the Wrong Question on Teacher Evaluation
item.description: If you’re interested in education, I highly recommend Justin Baeder’s1Â ”On Performance” blog hosted over on Education Week. Today, he ended his post with a question, “I would be very interested to learn of any other sector that has achieved substantial performance gains by reforming its evaluation processes. We’re putting a lot of eggs in the ‘improve teacher evaluation to improve student learning’ basket, but no one even seems to be asking whether this strategy has any merit.
